[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/webpack5-module-minifier-plugin](./webpack5-module-minifier-plugin.md) &gt; [ModuleMinifierPlugin](./webpack5-module-minifier-plugin.moduleminifierplugin.md)

## ModuleMinifierPlugin class

Webpack plugin that minifies code on a per-module basis rather than per-asset. The actual minification is handled by the input `minifier` object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ModuleMinifierPlugin implements WebpackPluginInstance
```

**Implements:** WebpackPluginInstance
